text: Ben or Benjamin Lamb may refer to: *Ben Lamb (actor) (born 1989), English actor *Ben Lamb (poker player) (born 1985), American poker player *Benjamin Lamb (fl. 1715), English organist ==See also== *Ben Lam (born 1991), New Zealand rugby union player *Benjamin G. Lamme (1864–1924), American electrical engineer
title: Ben Lamb
